body: Aaron in Azerbaijan comments on a recent article noting that among many statues to be found in the country is one of Egypt's Hosni Mubarak. While recognizing some of the similarities between the ruling regimes in both countries, the blog says that they end there and fall far short of anticipating any form of popular uprising in Azerbaijan.
original_body: Aaron in Azerbaijan comments on a recent article noting that among many statues to be found in the country is one of Egypt's Hosni Mubarak. While recognizing some of the similarities between the ruling regimes in both countries, the blog says that they end there and fall far short of anticipating any form of popular uprising in Azerbaijan.
title: Azerbaijan: Statues and Revolution

sentence: Aaron in Azerbaijan comments on a recent article noting that among many statues to be found in the country is one of Egypt's Hosni Mubarak.

While recognizing some of the similarities between the ruling regimes in both countries, the blog says that they end there and fall far short of anticipating any form of popular uprising in Azerbaijan.
